description:
Gigi Perez reflects on how music first became part of her life. 
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube  

It’s been a heckuva last 10 months for singer-songwriter Gigi Perez. Returning to her home in New Jersey, Perez started releasing songs as an independent artist … and found that the songs really struck a chord with audiences. During an interview at The Current, Perez explains how music first entered her life. 

Credits
Guest – @gigi4perez 
Host – Ayisha Jaffer
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Video – Evan Clark
Audio – Eric Xu Romani
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producer – Luke Taylor
